name: alexapi/routefinder
description: Goal: Extract Joomla Api Routes to be able to auto-generate always up-to-date OpenAPI Schema

scripts.routefinder-download-stable: if [ -f ./tmp/${APP_STABLE}.zip ]; then echo "Already downloaded" && exit 0; else php -r "file_put_contents('./tmp/${APP_STABLE}.zip', file_get_contents('https://downloads.joomla.org/fr/cms/joomla4/${APP_STABLE}/Joomla_${APP_STABLE}-Stable-Full_Package.zip'));" && echo "Finished download"; fi
scripts.routefinder-download-dev: if [ -f ./tmp/${APP_REF_TAG}.zip ]; then echo "Already downloaded" && exit 0; else php -r "file_put_contents('./tmp/${APP_REF_TAG}.zip', file_get_contents('https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/archive/refs/tags/${APP_REF_TAG}.zip'));" && echo "Finished download"; fi

scripts-descriptions.routefinder-download-stable: Given the version you choose, Joomla 4 and above, download the stable version locally
scripts-descriptions.routefinder-extract-stable: Extract zip archive of stable version of Joomla downloaded
scripts-descriptions.routefinder-download-dev: Given the git tag you choose, e.g. 5.0.0-beta1, download the corresponding version locally
scripts-descriptions.routefinder-extract-dev: Extract zip archive of specific version of Joomla corresponding to a specific git tag e.g. 5.0.0-beta1
scripts-descriptions.routefinder-find: Find Joomla Web Services routes by static analysis of the downloaded Joomla source code.
scripts-descriptions.routefinder-result: Show final result of Joomla Web Services routes found
